alert.note: Alert for Brown; Kewaunee; Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 7:32PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Brown, southwestern Kewaunee and northeastern Outagamie Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 732 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pulaski to 14 miles northwest of Green Bay to 12 miles southwest of Oconto. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Bay, Bay Shore Park, Bellevue Town, Luxemburg and Denmark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
